name: Omi 3D
description:
Download Omi card game for Windows Free !

Omi 3D is the newest game to play popular card game Omi in your Windows computer with quality 3D graphics. It's a 4 player cards game played with standard card deck. Omi has simple rules, so it's easy to learn. There are few strategies you should learn to master the game, but you can learn them quickly while playing. few minor game play elements from the original Omi game is still not available, but it doesn't make the game any less enjoyable . Download the game, Play and enjoy !

Share the news about Omi3D Release with your friends in Facebook !

Like to the Official Facebook page to be in touch with the updates and news !

Omi3D Now have 600+ Downloads !
